<!-- This is generated by the MarsSim HelpGenertor, do not edit. -->

## Description
Organic waste from a dead crop or inedible biomass after harvest. 

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Edible:|false|
|Type:|Waste|
|Form:|Solid|
